resources.string: Our Goal is reach the news to everyone with realtime and with free of cost Short News gives you access to world leading newspapers and publications. With Short News, you will get live access to National and Local news and health news in English in a single app. The Short News app gives you news on India and World affairs, Cricket, entertainment, movies, business and technology with gadget reviews. The app is optimized for slow internet connectivity along with great and timely updates. Now, you don’t need to download several apps from different news sources – just install ShortNews get all the news from different publications in single App only!
